title: Jeb：饥饿条的加入时间
author: Neubulaeko
txt_content:
本帖最后由 891215991 于 2014-5-8 18:51 编辑 

Jens Bergensten @jeb_
I should start a restaurant called the "Hunger Bar", because people are always asking about it :D

       Jeb：我应该开一家名为“饿吧”的餐厅，因为有很多人在问这东西（指饥饿条）啊:D
Jens Bergensten @jeb_
(In MC:PE, hunger will be added after potion brewing, which is added after the Nether, which is added after... who knows?)


Jeb：在MCPE里面，饥饿条会在炼药之后推出，而炼药会在地狱后推出，而地狱会在……谁知道在什么东西后呢？

总之我想喊：我**！！！

replies.author: fff1123
replies.txt_content: I should start a restaurant called the "Hunger Bar", because people are always asking about it 我应该开一家名为“饥饿条”的餐馆，因为人们一直在问关于这个（的资讯）。哈哈         (In MC:PE, hunger will be added after potion brewing, which is added after the Nether, which is added after... who knows?) 在mcpe里，将在药水酿造系统之后加入饥饿系统，（至于）在地狱后之后会加入哪个，之后又会加入哪个，谁知道呢~？

replies.txt_content: 上面不太对。 I should start a restaurant called the "Hunger Bar", because people are always asking about it :D 我应该去开一家叫“食吧”的餐馆，因为大家常常在询问关于这个（的事情） hunger bar，食吧， bar，网吧，茶吧，氧吧 吧，…的场所。的意思。 另外，hunger bar在MC里的意思是饥饿槽，暗示可能加入饥饿系统。
